imdb.title: Shtarkers
plot: What happens when a Hasidic Jewish delivery boy robs a mob-filled barbershop?::Tony Perzow
synopsis: One night a couple of desperate neighborhood thugs need to score cash quickly in order to immediately pay off a debt to Uncle Moe the Shylock. Uncle Moe is a man you don't want to mess with. Even more dangerous than Uncle Moe is his associate Solly the Collector. Solly is the man who comes after you when you're late on a payment. knowing this full well, the thugs devise a plan using a prostitute to help lure a drug dealer into a dark alley in the hopes that he will be carrying a significant amount of cash that could cover the debt. Meanwhile, Uncle Moe the Shylock is slowly making his way into the very same alley to meet the thugs and collect. In a perfect world, the thugs jump the dealer, score enough a cash, pay Uncle Moe and everybody is happy, right? Wrong, on this particular night, everything that could go wrong does go wrong, setting up a comedy of errors that will have you laughing with delight. Wait, there's a witness! David, a young Hasidic Jewish delivery boy for Moishes Deli has witnessed the whole ordeal through his bathroom window. What will he do with this information? Never in his life has his virgin Hasidic eyes been exposed to such filth, perversion and violence. The World Premiere of SHTARKERS will put a smile on your face and a catchy song in your head. We had to throw in a musical number!
